channel.title: Najarin on Chaotic Online
channel.description: Recent content in Najarin on Chaotic Online

item.title: A Fearsome Fate
item.description: In the previous episodes, Tom finally got a new scan of his favorite Creature, Maxxor, but when he used it for the first time in battle he realizes that something is wrong.

item.title: A Rare Hazard
item.description: In the first episode of the Second Season, we will have a closure for events of the previous episode, with right to terrorism and espionage

item.title: Eye of the Maelstrom
item.description: In this episode, Tom and his friends will help Najarin and a group of Mipedians in an important mission and that trust is a gift, not a right

item.title: Fighting Friendly (Season Finale)
item.description: In this episode… the end! Of the season, of a promising career and of a long time friendship…

item.title: Last Stand (Part 1)
item.description: In this episode, the beginning of the end… the battle for Perim is now!

item.title: Last Stand (Part 2)
item.description: In this episode, the battle continues in different regions of Perim at once… and in the Tribal Alliance itself as well

item.title: Legions of Aa'une (Season Finale)
item.description: In this episode, the battle continues with overturns and some shifting… and the end!

item.title: Maxxor
item.description: Maxxor is an OverWorld Hero and ruler of the OverWorld Tribe

item.title: Maze of Menace
item.description: In this episode, continuing the sequence in which the Commander of the Otherworld, Maxxor, was ambushed by Lord Van Bloot’s treacherous Mugic, we’ll see a partnership between Creatures and humans to restore the Fallen Hero before it’s too late.

item.title: Perithon!
item.description: In this episode, after an intense battle and glorious victory over the M’arrillians, the Tribes decide to keep Tribal Alliance towards a prosperous Perim and, to celebrate the peace, they make a car race… but old habits die hard…

item.title: Putting the Muge in Mugic
item.description: In this episode we’ll have a common (and unnecessary) territorial war complete with treason, sabotage, counter-espionage and lessons of leadership between OverWorlders and Mipedians

item.title: Son of the Spiritlands
item.description: In this episode, an indestructible Creature from the Spiritlands threatens to destroy the whole Perim unless Tangath Toborn faces him.

item.title: Threshold of Destruction
item.description: In this episode, once Dranakis Threshold’s secret leaked out, several players ported to ancient Perim, including Chaotic’s “Bonnie & Clyde”, who didn’t take long in conspiring with an old acquaintance, making of a painful event become, potentially, irreversible.

item.title: Time's Up
item.description: In this episode we’ll have a grayish, silent, “Futuresight” with a small and subtle spoiler of the Season’s apex

item.title: Welcome to Chaotic (Part 2)
item.description: In continuation of the series, after entering his access code, Tom discovers that all of Kaz’s fantasies were real and has his first battle in Chaotic

item.title: Yesterday's Heroes
item.description: In this episode we’ll meet Vlar, a thief renegade by the OverWorld Tribe of Ancient Perim which, possibly, is Maxxor ancestor
